title: EditorSettings
description: The EditorSettings stored as editorSettings.json holds semantic model editor settings that are saved as part of the semantic model definition for use across users or environments. This file is optional.

showHiddenFields.title: ShowHiddenFields
showHiddenFields.description: Whether hidden fields should be shown in a field list.

autodetectRelationships.title: AutodetectRelationships
autodetectRelationships.description: Whether relationships should be automatically detected when adding tables.

parallelQueryLoading.title: ParallelQueryLoading
parallelQueryLoading.description: Whether multiple M queries should be run in parallel.

typeDetectionEnabled.title: TypeDetectionEnabled
typeDetectionEnabled.description: Whether to detect column types and headers for unstructured data sources.

relationshipImportEnabled.title: RelationshipImportEnabled
relationshipImportEnabled.description: Whether relationships should be imported from data sources during the first load of data.

relationshipRefreshEnabled.title: RelationshipRefreshEnabled
relationshipRefreshEnabled.description: Whether relationships should be updated or deleted when refreshing data.

runBackgroundAnalysis.title: RunBackgroundAnalysis
runBackgroundAnalysis.description: Whether to load data previews for the query editor in the background.

shouldNotifyUserOfNameConflictResolution.title: ShouldNotifyUserOfNameConflictResolution
shouldNotifyUserOfNameConflictResolution.description: Whether we should alert the user when we automatically update a user's table and/or measure names.
